### Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
#### Solicitation Number
01R11-24-C058

#### Government Agency
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

#### Contracting Authority
Melissa Smith, Contracting Specialist
Western Service Centre, 300 – 2010 12th Avenue, Regina, SK S4P 0M3
Phone: (306) 515-4796, Fax: (306) 780-5018, Email: [melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca](mailto:melissa.smith3@agr.gc.ca)

The Government of Canada intends to award a contract for **Comprehensive Plant Metabolome Assay** services to a pre-identified supplier. This Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) invites other suppliers to submit a Statement of Capabilities, if they believe they can meet the requirements of the contract.

**Scope of Work**
The Contractor shall conduct a Comprehensive plant metabolome analysis (amine/phenol, acid, hydroxyl, and carbonyl channels) on 120 samples of Chickpea plants, provided by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC).

**Contract Period**
The contract period is expected from [Contract Award] to March 31, 2024, with optional analysis that may be required from April 1, 2024, to March 31, 2025.

**Estimated Value**
The estimated value of the contract is $48,080.00 (excluding GST), with optional services valued at $30,000.00.

**Pre-identified Contractor**
The Metabolomics Innovation Centre (TMIC) Li-Node has been selected as the pre-identified contractor for this contract.

**Justification for Sole Source Procurement**
TMIC is the only supplier that can provide the required Comprehensive plant metabolome analysis services, as they have developed the Plant Metabolome Assay (PMA) technique and hold the ownership and rights to use of this technique.

**Procedure**
If no other supplier submits a Statement of Capabilities that meets the requirements of the ACAN, the Government may proceed with the award of the contract to the pre-identified contractor. If a Statement of Capabilities is received that meets the requirements, the Government will proceed with a full tendering process.

**Submission of Statement of Capabilities**
Suppliers interested in bidding on this contract must submit a Statement of Capabilities, in writing, to the Contracting Authority, on or before the closing date of this ACAN
